CAS.name: Points
CAS.what: Points is a software for computations related to points in projective spaces over the finite fields of type Z_p.
CAS.address: Dip. di Matematica e Applicazioni "R. Caccioppoli" Univ. di Napoli "Federico II" Complesso di Monte S. Angelo Via Cintia - 80126 Napoli- Italy
CAS.author: Francesca Cioffi, Ferruccio Orecchia, Isabella Ramella
